General.Name: Aspen Group Ltd
General.Description: Aspen Group Ltd. owns, manages, and leases real estate properties in Israel and Europe. Its property portfolio comprises offices and logistic properties. The company was formerly known as Aspen Construction and Development Ltd. and changed its name to Aspen Group Ltd. in July 2009. The company was incorporated in 1978 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.
